name: WEN 3620 5-Amp 3-1/2-Inch Plunge Cut Compact Circular Saw with Laser, Carrying Case, and Three Blades
short_description: Perfect for flooring, tile, drywall, sheet metal, carpet, ceramic, PVC, wood, pipes and more
Retractable spring-loaded plunge shoe allows for simple and safe plunge cuts up to 1-1/8 inches deep
Illuminate your line of cut and maximize accuracy with the included laser
5A motor rotates the 3-1/2-inch blade to 4500 times per minute
Includes an HSS metal-cutting blade, a diamond-coated tile-cutting blade, a carbide-tipped wood cutting blade, a carrying case, a dust extraction tube, a rip-guide fence, and a two-year warranty
product_description: Remember when you could make cuts quickly and easily? The WEN 5-Amp Plunge Cut 3-1/2-Inch Mini Circular Saw provides versatile and powerful performance all in the palm of your hand. Perfect for wood flooring, drywall, tile, sheet metal, pipes, carpet and more. Its compact design weighs in at a mere 5 pounds, limiting fatigue during operation and making for easy storage between jobs. The 5-amp motor provides maximum torque, spinning the 3-1/2 inch blade (89mm, 10mm arbor) up to 4500 RPM. Attack boards up to 1-1/8 inch in thickness. Adjust the depth stop to your desired cutting depth for the perfect plunge cut in even the hardest of woods. Your WEN Compact Circular Saw also comes packed with accessories, including a carbide-tipped wood-cutting blade, a diamond-coated tile-cutting blade, a soft metal and plastic-cutting blade, a 5-inch rip fence, a dust extraction tube, and a convenient blow-mold carrying case, complete with storage compartments for all your accessories. And, because its a WEN product, your handheld circular saw comes backed by a nationwide network of skilled service technicians, a friendly customer help line and a two year warranty, all to make sure you remember WEN.

name: Ryobi 18V 5-1/2" Circular Saw
short_description: 5-1/2" Circular Saw
Ryobi
Cordless
1-11/16" depth of cut
Fast Cuts
product_description: Expand your RYOBI 18V ONE+ System with the RYOBI 18V ONE+ Cordless Circular Saw. Make over 215 fast, clean cuts per charge on the ONE+ Cordless 5 1/2 in. Circular Saw with 4,700 RPM and the included 18T Carbide Tipped Blade. This saw is ideal for cross cuts in 2-by material with 1-11/16 in. maximum depth of cut. Bevel up to 50 degrees to complete a wide variety of cuts and with 1-3/16 in. depth of cut at 45 Degrees of bevel. Purchase the accessory vacuum dust adaptor (sold separately) to connect this saw to your wet/dry vac for quick and easy clean up. Best of all, it is part of the RYOBI ONE+ System of over 260 Cordless Tools that all work on the same battery platform. This 18V ONE+ Cordless 5-1/2 in. Circular Saw is backed by the RYOBI 3-Year Manufacturer's Warranty. Battery and charger sold separately.

name: CRAFTSMAN V20 4-1/2 Inch Cordless Circular Saw, Bare Tool Only (CMCS405B)
short_description: Brushless motor: up to 4500 no-load rpm
Ease of use: auxiliary handle allows for ease of use
Dust control feature: on-board front dust port
Accuracy: sliding rip fence improves accuracy
Bevel: bevel at 45° to cut 1x dimensional lumber
Safety: electronic blade brake stops blade quickly
Convenience: on-board blade key storage for quick blade change
product_description: Step up to More Runtime and Better Performance with the V20*BRUSHLESS RP Cordless 4-1/2 in. Circular Saw. Its lightweight design makes it perfect for tight spaces and extended-reach applications. The brushless motor delivers up to 4,500 no-load RPM for efficient cutting through various materials. With a 4-1/2” blade, you can cut 2x material at 90° and 1x at 45°. The auxiliary handle enables one-handed operation and easy use. (Battery and Charger sold separately).

name: Circular Saw, 5.8A 4-1/2" Circular Saw w/Laser, Metal Auxiliary Handle, 6 Blades (4½", 4¾"), Cutting Depth 1-11/16" (90°), 1-3/8" (45°), Ideal for Wood, Soft Metal, Plastic, Tile - MCS01A
short_description: 6 BLADES FOR ALL CUTS: Included 2pcs 4¾" TCT Blades for cutting wood, 2pcs 4½" TCT Blades for cutting soft metal and plastic, and 2pcs 4½" blades for cutting tile. You can achieve different material (woodworking, plastic, soft metal and tile) cutting needs by simply changing the blades.
PRECISE CUTTING: This compact saw offers a built-in laser guide and an edge guide, which can help you to make more straight and precise cuttings.

STABLE CUTTING: Equipped with an extra metal auxiliary handle that can be easily installed on both the left and right sides and a much larger base of 3.5*9.5 inches, this small saw promises you more stable cutting.
45° BEVEL CUTTING: Only takes two steps to easily adjust the Bevel Angle from 0 to 45°, and you can get a Max cutting depth of 1-1/8" in the case of 45° bevel cutting.
90° CROSS CUTTING: With the Depth Adjustable Level, you can vary the cutting depth up to 1-11/16" according to your cutting needs while cross-cutting.

ENHANCED SAFETY CUTTING: The machine is designed to prevent accidental activation, ensuring a higher level of safety. To start the machine, both the power switch and safety lock must be simultaneously pressed. (NOTE: Once the machine is activated, the safety lock can be released, allowing continuous operation by merely holding the power switch.) A workshop vacuum can be attached to the saw to collect much of the dust created from cutting.

WE OFFERING: DOVAMAN MCS01A Portable Circular Saw (Only 120V is applicable), 2 x 24-teeth 4¾" TCT Blade for Wood (one pre-installed), 2 x 60-teeth 4½" TCT Blade for Soft metal, 2 x 4½" Blade for Tile, Metal Auxiliary Handle, Edge Guide, Vacuum Adapter, 5mm Hex Key, User Manual, and 24-Hour Fast Response Premium Customer Service.
FRIENDLY REMINDER: When disassembling and assembling the saw blade, be sure to firmly press and hold the orange lock shaft button (located on the side away from the blade).

name: WEN 4.2-Amp 3-3/8-Inch Plunge Cut Compact Circular Saw with Laser, Carrying Case, and Three Blades (36704)
short_description: Retractable spring-loaded plunge shoe allows for simple and safe plunge cuts
Perfect for flooring, tile, drywall, sheet metal, carpet, ceramic, PVC, wood, pipes and more
4.2A motor rotates the 3-3/8 inch blade (85mm, 15 mm arbor) up to 4500 times per minute
Adjust the depth stop to create cuts in boards up to one inch in thickness

Includes an HSS metal-cutting blade, a diamond-coated tile-cutting blade, a carbide-tipped wood cutting blade, a carrying case, an 80-inch dust extraction tube, a rip-guide fence, and a two-year warranty
product_description: Remember when you could make cuts quickly and easily? The WEN 4.2-Amp Plunge-Ready Mini Circular Saw provides versatile and powerful performance all in the palm of your hand. Perfect for wood flooring, drywall, tile, sheet metal, pipes, carpet and more. Its compact design weighs in at a mere 4.5 pounds, limiting fatigue during operation and making for easy storage between jobs. The 4.2-amp motor provides maximum torque, spinning the 3-3/8 inch blade (85mm, 15mm arbor) up to 4500 RPM. Attack boards up to 1 inch in thickness. The easy-to-use trigger features a slot for your finger, allowing the saw to automatically engage as you push forward. Adjust the depth stop to your desired cutting depth for the perfect plunge cut in even the hardest of woods. Your WEN Compact Circular Saw also comes packed with accessories, including an HSS metal-cutting blade, a diamond-coated tile-cutting blade, a carbide-tipped wood cutting blade, a 5-inch rip fence, an 80-inch dust extraction tube, and a convenient blow-mold carrying case, complete with storage compartments for all your accessories. And, because its a WEN product, your handheld circular saw comes backed by a nationwide network of skilled service technicians, a friendly customer help line and a two year warranty, all to make sure you remember WEN.

name: GALAX PRO 4Amp 3500RPM Circular Saw with Laser Guide, Max. Cutting Depth1-11/16"(90°), 1-1/8"(45°）Compact Saw with 4-1/2" 24T TCT Blade, Vacuum Adapter, Blade Wrench, and Rip Guide
short_description: Powerful circular saw: 4-amp electric motor – delivers a no load speed of 3,500 rpm – easily cuts through wood, PVC tubing, laminate flooring, plastic, plasterboard and MDF. Includes an 24T Tungsten Carbide Tipped Blade 4-1/2 in diameter. Arbor Size: 3/8in

Laser guide and bevel lever: This mini saw comes with laser beam guide and the scale ruler, which can assist you to cut a straight line for when high precision is needed. Accurate cuts are assured by the parallel guide and laser light. Angle adjustment for bevel cuts of up to 45°

Depth gauge lever and dust extraction system: This mini circular saw can adjust the cutting depth anywhere from 0 to 1-11/16"(42.8mm) with a max. cut of 42.8 mm in order to adapt to perform better when cutting different materials. Leave your working area free of dust with the vacuum adaptor, for more precise cuts and helping you to focus on the task without the mess

Compact & handy circular saw: Compact body and lightweight perfect for one-handed operation; it features ergonomic soft handles for better hand-feeling and provides optimum cutting line visibility for tight detail work
What you get: 1* Mini Circular saw, 1* 24T tungsten-carbide-tipped wood/plastic blade, 1* allen key for saw change, 1* rip guide, 1* vacuum adapter, 1* user manual, 1* warranty card

name: Circular Saw Guide Rail,for 4-1/2" Compact Cordless Mini Circular Saw,Adjustable Edge Cutting Guide,Cutting Machine Edge Guide Positioner,Wood Cutting Tool,Wood Modified Positioning Frame Tool
short_description: 【Versatile Carpenter Tools】For left- or right-bladed saws and users.This circular saw guide rail can help you solve the problems encountered in woodworking projects, such as carving auxiliary lines, purchasing expensive table saws, making homemade auxiliary guides.Using this circular saw guide can help you solve all kinds of problems

We will try our best to present the exact colour for you. Please understand that the size may vary slightly due to manual measurement. ﻿

name: Mini Circular Saw, 5.8Amp 3500RPM Corded With Laser Guide, Rip Guide, Compact With 2Pcs TCT Blades for Wood Cuts

Flexible and precise cutting: The laser guide and rip guide ensure the electric circular saw keep moving on a straight line, make a precise and quick cut; Cutting depth up to 1-11/16"(42.8mm) at 90°,1-1/8"(28mm) at 45°

Compact and portable: G LAXIA mini handy circular saw weighs only 6 lbs, bringing less fatigue and it can be carried to anywhere easily; Small and compact size for excellent maneuverability and portability

name: Worx WX439L 4.5 Amp WORXSAW 4.5" Electric Compact Circular Saw
short_description: [ONE-HAND OPERATION] The newly designed slim form factor makes the Worxsaw even lighter and more maneuverable. Grab it with one hand, and you’re good to go
[2” CUTTING CAPACITY] Made to cut up to 2” thick stock lumber. It’s made for quick rip cuts around the house, too, but lumber is where it really gets to work
[EASY DEPTH ADJUSTMENTS] Just press down the lever and raise or lower the main handle until you’re at the depth you desire for the project at hand
[45 Degree BEVEL CUTS] For artistic or functional end pieces, you can come at your wood from an angle that’s just right

[DO IT YOURSELF. DO IT BETTER. DO IT WITH WORX.] Worx tools are engineered with cutting-edge technology, and above modern efficiency standards, so you can build a cost-effective tool collection that’s been designed to last
[QUICK BLADE CHANGE] Hold the red spindle lock, grab the hex key, unscrew the bolt, release the flange, switch out the blade and repeat those steps in reverse
[DUST EXTRACTION] The dust port lets you hook up a vacuum so you can keep a clean work area. It makes things safer and it’s easier to see what you're cutting
[4100 RPM] Easily slices through 2x4s. It reaches the same speeds as larger saws on account of its smaller 4-1/2” blade
[INCLUDES] 4.5” Compact Circular Saw, Wood Cutting Blade, Hex Key
product_description: Ever wish you had a circular saw you can use with one hand? The 4-1/2” Worxsaw Compact Circular Saw is for the DIY-er that wants to put a little more muscle and flexibility into their projects. We’ve gone all-in on the maneuverability angle and created a sleek, easy to use, lightweight electrical saw that quickly adjusts cutting depth up to 2” (so you can tear through stock lumber), quickly adjusts for bevel cutting from 0-45, and lets you do all your cutting with one hand by utilizing an ergonomic, comfortable grip. Its 4100 rpm will slice through 2x4s in a single pass. And the smaller blade—4-1/2” compared to the 7-1/4” of a traditional circular saw—requires less power to get up to the same speeds of much larger saws. That puts less strain on the motor and extends the life of the tool. The Worxsaw is made for wood, but it’ll cut many materials. The left-sided blade housing gives you clean lines of sight for your cuts and the dust port lets you attach a vacuum and keep sawdust out of your way. An included parallel guide will come in handy as you and your Worxsaw make quick work of the projects around your shop.

name: SKIL 20V Brushless 6-1/2In. Cordless Compact Circular Saw Kit for Wood Cutting including 2.0Ah Battery and Charger-CR6413B-11
short_description: 20V CIRCULAR SAW KIT - Set includes the cordless circular saw, a PWR CORE 20 2.0Ah lithium battery, 20V standard charger, and 18T carbide thin kerf circular saw blade
POWERFUL BRUSHLESS MOTOR - Delivers up to 5,500 RPM and 105 cuts in 2x4 pine on a single charge with the included PWR CORE 20 2.0Ah battery
COMPACT, ERGONOMIC DESIGN - Blade left design for optimized visibility of your cut line
SHADOW LINE - Innovative LED creates a shadow effect on your cut line
ELECTRIC BRAKE - Stops blade quickly for added safety

LONGER RUNTIME & BATTERY LIFE - Industry-leading PWR CORE 20 lithium battery technology wraps each cell with cooling material to keep the battery powering on for 25% longer runtime and 2X battery life
product_description: The SKIL PWR CORE 20™ Brushless 6-1/2 In. Circular Saw packs a powerful brushless motor into a compact, ergonomic design so you can power through any project. The SKIL saw features a brushless motor that delivers up to 5,500 RPM and 105 cuts in 2x4 pine on a single charge with the included PWR CORE 20™ 2.0Ah battery. It’s compact and lightweight with an ergonomic blade-left design for optimized visibility of your cut line. An LED and trace indicator create a shadow effect on your cut line for enhanced visibility while an electric brake stops the blade quickly between cuts for added safety. The compact circular saw kit includes the cordless saw, PWR CORE 20™ 2.0Ah lithium battery, 20V standard charger, 18T carbide thin kerf blade, onboard hex key, and vacuum adaptor.
